text: Completely out of nowhere, but I am fascinated by wings. Seriously, I couldn't stop staring at that pterodactyl's wings. I wanted desperately for them to move! (It's just something about the motion of wings...they're so fascinating to me! Right up on that list of things that fascinate me: tails (specifically cat tails or anything that can move like them) and slit pupils, such as cat eyes or reptile eyes.)

text: I started to listen to your playlist a while ago. I just got to 450. I thought i'd scroll down to see what's up next. Then I saw the game music that I was missing for 450 videos. Lost Eden soundtrack....... magical. The one game which only I know about in my circle. And especially the music makes this game all the better. It's funny because I wanted to recomment this music to you supra but you already got hold of this treasure!! Keep up you work!!

text:
@Nekuriddo it is the original track from the soundtrack CD yes. But the game's version is indeed different. There's only violins playing at certain times there.
